shows.title: Reclaiming Your Power / Dark Enlightenment
shows.first_half: Visionary entrepreneur Bradley Freedom joins Richard Syrett to expose how powerful institutions control the five pillars of life-- and what you can do to break free. He unpacks how to reclaim power without overlords, reveals what’s really in your food, and lays out the financial traps keeping you stuck. He’ll also share unconventional paths to spiritual freedom, helping you disconnect from the matrix and reconnect with yourself.
shows.second_half: In the second half, Isaac Weishaupt will be discussing the Dark Enlightenment philosophy and how it’s the hidden architecture behind today’s political and technological shifts into an Orwellian control system. The Dark Enlightenment is an overthrow of social democracy and egalitarian ideas in favor of an elitist control system run by the technocracy to support a Great Reset.

shows.title: Mars Exploration / Spiritual Healing
shows.first_half: First Half: Mars Society President Robert Zubrin will discuss the exploration and settlement of Mars, including the current crisis facing the Mars exploration program, how Mars settlement will most likely happen, and what it means for the future of humanity.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Spiritual and energy healer Ofer Niv will share his views on how suffering, emotional pain, chronic illness, and trauma are not the end of our story but the beginning of fundamental transformation. He helps people to explore how suppressed emotions, limiting beliefs, and inherited wounds can become gateways to healing and spiritual insight.

shows.title: Intelligent Design / Angels & Guides
shows.first_half: First Half: Douglas Axe is a Professor of Computational Biology and a faculty advisor to the AI Lab at Biola University. He will be discussing recent developments in intelligent design and the significant progress that has been made, both in terms of research and the intellectual climate of the academy.
shows.second_half: Second Half: TransformationaI teacher Sunny Dawn Johnston will address the profound intelligence of the unseen realms, and how our departed loved ones, angels, and guides are working overtime to help us navigate this moment in human history. She'll show us how more people are waking up to the signs and synchronicities.

shows.title: Faked Deaths & Intuition / Spiritual Warfare
shows.first_half: First Half: Author and adjunct professor Elizabeth Greenwood will discuss people who have disappeared and/or have faked their own deaths. She'll also bring us her research on the magical human ability of intuition and share tips from experts, including neuroscientists and psychics.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Author & spiritual warrior Bill Bean will discuss his personal journey and how he began his career as an exorcist. He'll provide the warning signs of a possible spiritual attack, along with information on how to stop it, as well as detail several cases he has been involved in.

shows.title: Natalee Holloway Case / Dogman & Bigfoot
shows.first_half: First Half: 20 years ago, high school senior Natalee Holloway disappeared on a graduation trip to Aruba. Private Investigator T.J. Ward discusses the details of this famous case, as well as confessed killer Joran van der Sloot and whether he acted alone or not.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Retired Army Iraq War veteran and Dogman/cryptid researcher Joedy Cook brings us his latest work on sightings of Dogman and other cryptids. He'll discuss the behavior of Bigfoot and other creatures he's encountered, as well as a 1982 alleged massacre in Kentucky where a couple was found mauled in what is suspected to be the work of a beast.

shows.title: Friday the 13th Lore / Open Lines
shows.first_half: Mark Anthony, the "psychic lawyer' joins Rich Berra (email) to explore how Friday the 13th isn't just superstition-- it’s a symbol of how fear, power, and paranoia have shaped our legal and cultural history. From the Templar arrests to the Salem witch trials, he’ll trace how this infamous date reflects deeper patterns of persecution and control. He’ll break down its influence on the U.S. Constitution, how superstition creeps into our laws, and why Friday the 13th still holds power over our collective psyche. Followed by Open Lines in the latter half.
